ValidationRule.description: Cannot change a Finance case if the mandatory fields are incomplete.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Refund'), OR ( ISBLANK(Invoice_Number__c), ISBLANK(Refund_Amount__c) ), LEFT(RecordType.DeveloperName, 3) = 'HU_' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mandatory fields are missing. Make sure the following fields are entered: Refund Amount, Invoice Number
